name: Project: Hymnus
description:
Project: Hymnus is a story-driven adventure turn-based rhythm RPG with pixel art style top down perspective, emphasizing on risk and reward in both story-wise and combat-wise. Witness the relationship between Aone and Shiola as you help them face their pasts… or you can choose not to.

Team:
Myself (Game Designer & Leader)
Muchamad Aditya (Sound Artist & Project Manager)
Gede Binar Kukuh W (Lead Programmer)
Leo Harnadi M (Programmer)
Tanisha Amalia P (2D Artist)
Clifford William (2D Artist)
